price: Ese (ababangikanyamana) bishyiriyeho ibigirwamana bishobora kuzura (abapfuye) bibakuye mu butaka?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
